title: PBE
body: Is it even possible to sign up to PBE? Every time I try it keeps saying something went wrong. I think I may have done it ages ago but I'm not sure.

replies.body: Nope, it's not currently possible to signup for the PBE while the site is down for maintenance.  We'll be continuing to post status updates on the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Hang tight!

good morning guys can anyone tell me how I can play on pbe these days.. my previous pbe account was disabled when they did that changeover to new system.. I put in ticket and the support person just gave me a pbe sign up link that is dead... any ideas??
